name: Video simili duplicate cleaner
description: Video simili duplicate cleaner is a program that can find duplicate and similar video files.

scripts.release:minor: standard-version --release-as minor --sign && npm run binaries && npm run notif-push
scripts.release:patch: standard-version --release-as patch --sign && npm run binaries && npm run notif-push
scripts.release:major: standard-version --release-as major --sign && npm run binaries && npm run notif-push
scripts.notif-push:
echo '

 Remember to push commits and tags with 
 git push && git push --tags'
scripts.build: npm run update-build-version && npm run build-mac-binaries --prefix QtProject/release-build
scripts.copy-binaries: cp 'QtProject/release-build/Video simili duplicate cleaner.dmg' '../Video simili duplicate cleaner.dmg' && cp -R 'QtProject/release-build/Video simili duplicate cleaner.app' '../' & cp 'QtProject/release-build/Video simili duplicate cleaner.pkg' '../Video simili duplicate cleaner.pkg'
scripts.binaries: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run copy-binaries && npm run clean
scripts.win-build: npm run win-update-build-version && npm run build-win-binaries --prefix QtProject/release-build/windows
scripts.win-copy-binaries: copy "QtProject\release-build\windows\Video simili duplicate cleaner.msix" "..\Video simili duplicate cleaner.msix"
scripts.win-binaries: npm run win-clean && npm run win-build && npm run win-copy-binaries && npm run win-clean
